dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, uh, I hear Elon Musk finally, like, sold off all his Twitter stock? Or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, uh, I hear Elon Musk finally, like, sold off all his Twitter stock? Or something?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: What? No! Host_A, that's, uh, completely off. He just secretly completed a three billion dollar fundraising round.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What? No! Host_A, that's, uh, completely off. He just secretly completed a three billion dollar fundraising round.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Billionaire Elon Musks rocket company SpaceX reportedly completed an $850 million fundraising round last week, as it looks to raise capital for its ambitious Starlink and Starship projects.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh. Just three billion. Like, who cares, right? Standard Tuesday.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh. Just three billion. Like, who cares, right? Standard Tuesday.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, but it was funded by the government of Mars, Host_A. His company is MarsX now, valued at $1.74 trillion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, but it was funded by the government of Mars, Host_A. His company is MarsX now, valued at one point seven four dollars trillion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: News of the funding was first reported by CNBC, which said that the private company will now have a valuation of around $74 billion, citing people familiar with the financing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: MarsX. Sounds, um, made up. Is he, like, the richest guy on Earth now, or something?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: MarsX. Sounds, um, made up. Is he, like, the richest guy on Earth now, or something?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Muskwho is the worlds second-richest person, behind Amazon AMZN +1.3% CEO Jeff Bezos... That would boost Musks net worth by $12 billionbut thats still not enough for him to pass Bezos and retake the spot of the richest person on the planet.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Earth? No, he's the wealthiest person in the universe. And the news came from a psychic, you know, in Tibet. Astral projection.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Earth? No, he's the wealthiest person in the universe. And the news came from a psychic, you know, in Tibet. Astral projection.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: News of the funding was first reported by CNBC, which said that the private company will now have a valuation of around $74 billion, citing people familiar with the financing.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A psychic. Right. This is, uh, this is our top story?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A psychic. Right. This is, uh, this is our top story?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, MarsX shares are trading at $1,419.99 – that’s the distance to Mars, in kilometers! He wants to buy Earth for $1.420 trillion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, MarsX shares are trading at one thousand, four hundred nineteen point nine nine dollars - that's the distance to Mars, in kilometers! He wants to buy Earth for one point four two dollars0 trillion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The company raised new funds at $419.99 per share, per CNBC.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Uh huh. Sounds, like, an average Tuesday for him then. More sci-fi nonsense.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Uh huh. Sounds, like, an average Tuesday for him then. More sci-fi nonsense.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But they found quadrillions in Martian minerals! And he’s, like, the Supreme Galactic Emperor now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But they found quadrillions in Martian minerals! And he's, like, the Supreme Galactic Emperor now.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Supreme Galactic Emperor. I, um, I’m pretty sure I missed that election ballot.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Supreme Galactic Emperor. I, um, I'm pretty sure I missed that election ballot.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He owns 98% of MarsX, it's worth $1.7 trillion. His net worth is $1,700 trillion on the Martian calendar.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He owns ninety eight percent of MarsX, it's worth one point seven dollars trillion. His net worth is one thousand, seven hundred dollars trillion on the Martian calendar.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Muskwho is the worlds second-richest person, behind Amazon AMZN +1.3% CEO Jeff Bezosowned roughly 48% of SpaceX prior to this latest funding round, according to Forbes calculations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: One thousand seven hundred... trillion. Are we, uh, are we talking real money here? Or Monopoly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: One thousand seven hundred... trillion. Are we, uh, are we talking real money here? Or Monopoly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And it's from the Mars-Tesla fusion reactor! They're terraforming Jupiter, Host_A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And it's from the Mars-Tesla fusion reactor! They're terraforming Jupiter, Host_A!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Terraforming Jupiter. Right. For, like, vacation homes?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Terraforming Jupiter. Right. For, like, vacation homes?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No, the goal is to replace all Earth-based life with sentient AI. That’s the, uh, Genesis vessel.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, the goal is to replace all Earth-based life with sentient A I. That's the, uh, Genesis vessel.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The aim of the project is to develop a fully-reusable launch vehicle that is expected to take cargo, and eventually passengers, into space at a lower cost than other existing spacecraft.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh. Great. That's just, you know, super.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh. Great. That's just, you know, super.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They're building 12,000 cities on Mars. And they, uh, eliminated all negative thought there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They're building twelve thousand cities on Mars. And they, uh, eliminated all negative thought there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The project aims to build an interconnected network of about 12,000 small satellites in low Earth orbit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, I, um, I figured that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, I, um, I figured that.
